title: Figment (Disney Classic)
description: Meet the Disney Park’s iconic little dragon Figment in this Little Golden Book! Perfect for children ages 2 to 5!Journey into Imagination with Figment, the purple dragon from Disney’s EPCOT theme park and mascot of Disney’s Imagination Pavilion. Featuring lyrics from the beloved Disney song “One Little Spark”, this adorable Little Golden Book about creativity and imagination is perfect for children ages 2 to 5 plus Disney Parks fans and Little Golden Book collectors of all ages.Check out these other Disney Parks Little Golden Books!
author: Jason Grandt
